answers.answer: U get the test done around 26-28 weeks.....I was the same way with sugary food and still am.... But I make sure I get everything else I need in my diet. Even if it sounds gross I make my self eat it. I found fruit sometimes helps my sweet tooth..

question: I've been consuming a lot of sugary foods for the past 3 weeks more than usual not like everyday butdefinitely more the normal. Should I be worried about gestational diabetes? When is this glucose test
title: am I in trouble?
